argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idafval.i | |- I = ( IdA ` C ) |
| 2 |  | idafval.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | idafval.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | idahom.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( HomA ` C ) = ( HomA ` C ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_idahom | |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) e. ( X ( HomA ` C ) X ) ) |
| 7 | 5 | #P_homacd | |- ( ( I ` X ) e. ( X ( HomA ` C ) X ) -> ( codA ` ( I ` X ) ) = X ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( codA ` ( I ` X ) ) = X ) |
